Description: A unique booking id
Gender of the reservation person
Age of the reservation person. Age is varying from 18 -- 70
Ethnicity of the reservation person. This field takes one of the following ethnicities: Latino, African American, Asian American and Caucasian
Educational level of the reservation person. This field takes one of the following educational level; Mid-School, High-School, College and Grad
Income of the reservation person. This field takes one of the following: <25K, 25K – 50K,50K – 100K and >100K
Country region of the reservation person. This field takes one of the following: North, South, East and West
Hotel type of the reservation; i.e City Hotels, Airport Hotels and Resorts
Expected check-in date
column3: Number of days planned to stay, checkin day, month, week of the month

Description: Expected checkout date
Reservation date
column3: Number of days until the check in date, Month of resevation, weekend or not

Description: Number of adults in the reservation. Note that one room can accommodate up to 5 people including children (Except babies)
Number of children in the reservation
Number of babies in the reservation
Selected meal type. Meal type can be one of the following: Bed and Break first (BB), Half-board (HB) or Full Board (FB)
Have previous reservation
Whether the travel cancel any reservations
Did traveler pay refundable full payment, non-refundable full payment or not

Field tell the way the traveler booked the reservation.  It takes one of the following; Direct (i.e from by direct call to the hotel or from hotel website), Online (From any Third party website or using any agent
Any car parking reservations need
What is the final status of the reservation. Use the check-in as class 1, cancel as class 2 and no-show as class 3 ( use numeric value 1, 2 and 3)
Did travel use any promo codes/discounts for the reservations
Discount rate if any
Room rate for a room per night
